line_id.description: Unique identifier for this line instance.

page_ref.description: Reference ID to the parent page (pag-page-layout).

line_index.description: Sequential position of the line within the page.

line_type.description: Defines the structural role of the line.

start_verse_ref.description: Reference to the first Ayah that begins or continues in this line.

first_word_ref.description: Foreign Key/ID reference to the first word (wrd-word-structure) in this line.

last_word_ref.description: Foreign Key/ID reference to the last word in this line.
